jd: From: Komal Gupta, Largeton Inc komal@largeton.us Reply to: komal@largeton.us Job Short DescriptionLinkedin mustTitle:Oracle Data Administrator Visa:No H1B/CPT/OPTDuration:12+monthsLocation: Tallahassee, FL (Onsite),local onlyClient: state of FLLinkedin must Key Highlights of the Role:Work with Oracle tools like OEM, RMAN, Data Guard, and more.Apply your expertise in SQL and PL/SQL to optimize performance.Collaborate with system admins and developers to solve complex challenges.Requirements:8+ years as a Database Administrator.Strong experience with backup procedures and recovery systems.A degree in Computer Science or a related field, with Oracle DBA certification.Regards,Komal Gupta | Sr. Technical RecruiterLargeton INC.Herndon, VA 20171Komal@largeton.us
